root.name: Capcom's Soccer Shootout
root.description: OverviewCapcom's Soccer Shootout is the US version of Japan's J. League Excite Stage '94. While both versions are identical in gameplay and modes, the US release excised the officially licensed Japanese League soccer players and teams of J. League Excite Stage '94 in favor of generic national teams and players. The Japanese release also included Barcode Battler cards for each team.TeamsEach team in Capcom's Soccer Shootout is adapted from an equivalent team in J. League Excite Stage '94. The team with the best overall stats is Germany/Shimizu S-Pulse.Capcom's Soccer ShootoutJ.League Excite Stage '94United StatesKashima AntlersBrazilJEF UnitedRussiaRed DiamondsArgentinaVerdy KawasakiMexicoYokohama MarinosFranceYokohama FlugelsGreat BritainBallmare HiratsukaGermanyShimizu S-PulseSpainJublio IwataHolland Nagoya GrampusItaly Gamba OsakaCameroonSanfrecce Hiroshima
